extendedInfo.description: Spell And Fill is a fun words & spellings app specially designed for Kids keeping ease of use and loads and loads of fun in mind. Spell And Fill gets your child a huge advantage learning & practicing spellings by making it fun and enjoyable.Spell And Fill uses features like interactive trivia, nice colours, reward system and winning gestures to teach kids. The apps are designed keeping ease of use and loads of fun in mind. The child only needs to tap the correct answer among the choice of four he is given. Every time he taps an option, the application talks and tells your kid if he is right or wrong.Feature Highlights1)      Difficulty levels targeting kids from age of 3 to 8.2)      Sound expressions for kids as they play.3)      Reward system and hidden surprises to keep kids busy.4)      Extremely easy to use with cute interface, color schemes and backgrounds.
